title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Raasi Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: VS clarity brilliant-cut diamonds and pear-shaped Zambian emeralds with vivid green hue. The necklace exhibits a subtle Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This Haaram features a layered, cascading design reminiscent of traditional Telugu jewelry. The intricate filigree detailing and the floral motifs are inspired by classical South Indian artistry. The pear-shaped emeralds are securely set within diamond-studded halos, adding depth and brilliance. The modern design ensures a comfortable fit and allows the gemstones' beauty to shine.
colors: The piece showcases a delicate contrast between the warm rose gold
the dazzling white of the diamonds
and the vibrant green of the Zambian emeralds
a color palette known for its auspiciousness and beauty.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali or Ugadi. This piece also seamlessly transitions to modern events
adding a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble. Ideal for Muhurtham
or even a high-profile corporate event.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design, making it a truly unique investment. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The emeralds are known for their prosperity-bringing properties, making this piece not only beautiful but also imbued with cultural significance. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of understated elegance.
